meanings.definition: The place of origin or earliest known history of something.
meanings.sent1: The provenances of the ancient artifact were traced back to a small village.
meanings.sent2: Historians study the provenances of old manuscripts to understand their origins.
meanings.sent3: Curious about the provenances of her favorite toy, Sarah decided to investigate.
meanings.sent4: The provenances of the mysterious painting led to a surprising discovery.
meanings.sent5: The provenances of the rare gemstone were shrouded in mystery.

meanings.definition: The history or origin of a person or thing.
meanings.sent1: The provenances of the family heirloom were passed down through generations.
meanings.sent2: Learning about the provenances of his favorite superhero fascinated Tim.
meanings.sent3: The provenances of the old house included tales of ghosts and hidden treasures.
meanings.sent4: In the library, the provenances of ancient books whispered stories of the past.
meanings.sent5: The provenances of the legendary sword were filled with heroic deeds.
